mdata.condensed:
17" alloy wheels
Side steps
7 SRS airbags
Vehicle stability control plus with active traction control
mdata.expanded:
Chrome-accented front grille
LED headlamps
LED Daytime running lights
Front fog lamps
Dual-zone air conditioning
Smart Entry & Start system
Toyota Touch®2 with 9 speakers
Rear-view camera display
Body-coloured front and rear bumper
Body-coloured, electric door mirrors
Cruise control
mdata.xhtml:
Delivering assured control both on and off the road, the LC3 has standard features including:

17" alloy wheels
Vehicle Stability Control (VSC) with Active Traction Control (A-TRC)
Hill-start Assist Control (HAC) and Downhill Assist Control (DAC) *
Dual zone Climate control air conditioning ***
Climate control air conditioning **
50/50 split/fold 3rd row seats **
7 SRS airbags (including driver's knee airbag)
Central differential lock with TORSEN© limited slip differential
Radio, CD audio system with Bluetooth©, iPod©/USB/AUX-in – 6 speakers
Smart Entry & Start System
Roof rails, black *
Sidesteps
Front fog lamps

* only available on the 5 door bodystyle
** only available on the 7 seat 5 door bodystyle
*** only available on the 5 seat 3 or 5 door bodystyle

derivatives.description: Land Cruiser Active 5dr 3.0 D-4D Auto 5st Protection

mdata.expanded:
Whatever the activity and location, protect your Land Cruiser from damage and dirt with this Protection Pack. Includes:
Boot liner and rear bumper protection plate that protects the rear of your Land Cruiser from scrapes whilst loading.
Side mouldings with chrome insert provides protection for your Land Cruiser's side panels against minor scrapes combined with a stylish chrome inlay. Available in black or painted to match your car.

derivatives.description: Land Cruiser Active 5dr 3.0 D-4D Auto 5st
Land Cruiser Active 5dr 3.0 D-4D Auto 7st Protection

mdata.expanded:
Whatever the activity and location, protect your Land Cruiser from damage and dirt with this Protection Pack. Includes:
Boot liner and rear bumper protection plate that protects the rear of your Land Cruiser from scrapes whilst loading.
Side mouldings with chrome insert provides protection for your Land Cruiser's side panels against minor scrapes combined with a stylish chrome inlay. Available in black or painted to match your car.
Option to select 7 seats on the Active variant.

mdata.condensed:
18" alloy wheels
Kinetic Dynamic Suspension System (KDSS)
Toyota Touch® 2 with Go Navigation system
Parking sensors (front and rear)
Masari Black or Ortaka Ivory Leather Interior
mdata.expanded:
DAB Radio
14 speaker JBL premium sound system
Heated and electrically ajustable front seats
Third row electric folding seats
4.2" high resolution colour multi-informational display
Chrome front grille
Dusk-sensing headlamps & Rain-sensing wipers
Aluminium and illuminated side steps
Privacy glass
Triple zone air conditioning
Refrigerated consolse box
Woodgrain accented interior
mdata.xhtml:
Several high tech features added to the LC3 brings out the supreme LC4 that impress from every angle. Features included are:

Kinetic Dynamic Suspension System (KDSS)
Navigation system with DVD-CH, Hard Disk Drive, Bluetooth©, iPod©, USB, AUX-in, JBL premium sound system – 17 speakers
Sequoia beige or Yukon dark grey leather interior
Powered and heated driver and passenger seats
Driver electric lumbar support
3rd row seats: power adjustable (leather)
18" alloy wheels
Triple zone climate control air conditioning
Back camera monitor
Parking sensors (front and rear)
Dusk sensing headlights
Rain sensing wipers
Headlamp cleaners
Electrochromatic rear view mirror
Privacy glass (rear)
Leather steering wheel, gear shift lever and knob
Optitron dials with multi-information display

derivatives.description: Land Cruiser Icon 5dr 3.0 D-4D Auto Off Road Pack Style Pack

mdata.expanded:
Style is personal. Its about adding extra touches of individuality. That’s exactly what the Safety Pack gives you. Includes:
Silver Pinnacle 18" alloy wheels
Rear Underrun
Rear lower boot garnish
Mirror Covers

The Off-Road Pack includes:
Crawl Control and Trailer Stability Control - maintain constant and stable low-speed off-road progress.
Multi-Terrain Select - provides a choice of five terrain modes: Rock, Rock and Dirt, Loose Rock, Mogul and Mud and Sand.
Multi-Terrain Monitor - 4 cameras allow you to see the road around you, helping you stay on your intended course, avoiding potential danager.
Lane change assist with Rear Cross Traffic Alert and Blind Spot Monitor - Manoeuvre more safely during lane changes.

mdata.condensed:
Adaptive Variable Suspension (AVS)
Active Height Control (AHC)
Blu-Ray Rear entertainment system with 9" screen
Multi-terrain Monitor with 4 cameras
Electric Sunroof
mdata.expanded:
4-spoke leather & wood steering wheel
Driver's position memory
Rear electric differential lock
Crawl control
2nd row heated seats
Rear cross traffic alert
Trailer stability control
Blind spot monitor
DAB Radio
14 speaker JBL premium sound system
Masari Black or Ortaka Ivory Leather Interior
mdata.xhtml:
The stylish top-of-the-range Land Cruiser oozes sophistication, quality and technology. In addition to the impressive LC4 specifications comes:

Adaptive Variable Suspension (AVS)
Active Height Control (AHC)
Rear entertainment system with 9" screen – CD/DVD/HDD input, Audio/visual input & headphone jacks
Multi-terrain Monitor with 4 cameras
Crawl Control and Multi-terrain Select
Steering Angle display
Sunroof
Memory position driver's seat
Leather/wood steering wheel
Leather/wood gear shift knob and lever
Rear electric differential lock

derivatives.description: Land Cruiser Invincible 5dr 3.0 D-4D Auto Safety Pack

mdata.expanded:
The Safety Pack includes:
Adaptive Cruise Control - has Vehicle - to vehicle distance control that maintains a pre-set distance from the vehicle in front by matching its speed.
Pre-Crash Safety System - uses radar technology to predict and prevent collisions and triggers audio-visual safety warnings; and also activates features such as Brake Assist.
